short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocking web requests from unwanted domains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adblock for You - An advertising blocker 

Adblock for You is your go-to solution for a cleaner, faster, and safer browsing experience. This extension offers improved performance with expanded filter lists and powerful features, all while operating independently.

Features:

★ Reliably blocks ads, banners, and pop-ups
★ Prevents ads on external websites
★ Stops the loading of preroll ads
★ No configuration required, no complicated lists to manage
★ Blocks all pre-roll video ads on any website
★ Consistently blocks banner and text ads
★ 100% free and regularly updated

If you like it, leave a positive review

Note: To ensure you always have the latest configuration and best experience, our extension periodically checks for configuration updates from our server. This requires the use of the "alarms" permission. Rest assured, no personal information is tracked or stored during this process. This helps us keep your extension running smoothly and up-to-date.
---
